location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP to illustrate Military Report on S.W. PERSIA'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 541 x 409mm, on sheet 654 x 499mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the region of Bakhti훮ri in south-western Persia. It is found in the Military Report on S. W. Persia, Volume IV. Kuhgalu Countrycompiled in the Division of the Chief of the Staff, Army Head Quarters, India. Routes identified in Volume IV and other routes are marked in red.The map includes a printing statement which reads 'I. B. Topo. Dy. No. 8,486. Exd. C. J. A. April 1910. No. 5,137-I., 1910.'.
